analysis.key_quote: By broadly stripping procedural and merit-based protections from thousands of policy-influencing career employees, the rule: Undermines the competitive, nonpartisan civil service; Exposes employees to at-will removal without notice or hearing; Threatens institutional memory, whistleblower reporting, and ethical governance.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting its detrimental effects on civil service protections, due process rights, and the risk of politicization, which aligns with the indicators of opposition.
